title: The Prayer Chain Discography 1991-2011 (11 Releases)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------
THE PRAYER CHAIN DISCOGRAPHY
--------------------------------------------------------------

This discography may or may not be complete.  It contains the following 11 releases...

 * 1991 - Neverland Sessions
 * 1992 - Whirlpool Ep
 * 1993 - Shawl
 * 1994 - Live - 4 Song EP
 * 1994 - Live - 8 Song EP
 * 1995 - Mercurios
 * 1995 - Mercury
 * 1996 - Antarctica
 * 1998 - Live At CBGB's
 * 2003 - Here Comes The Rust
 * 2011 - Humb

The Prayer Chain was a 1990s Christian alternative rock band. The band has been called "the epitome of the Christian underground". The Prayer Chain was known for producing moody, angst-ridden music which was, in turn, the result of creative differences within the band and with their record label.

Glory Above,
TorrentTracts - October 2013
